page.title: 18LOCAL NEWS-SUTTON ST JAMES
page.content: Most local news items in the paper deal with reports from the various clubs and meetings in the village. They are much the same type of reports that you would read for any village in any area. Sometimes, there are stories which cause more of a stir. There has been some heated discussion about the siting of a bus shelter recently, with people having different ideas as to where it should be put. Another important piece of news is the current price for potatoes,beet and strawberries. This always is very much discussed so people can decide what to grow next year, or what not to grow. Another very useful way of finding things out is to get the parish magazine.
